note: [Risk factors](#dod:risk-factor) are not mutually exclusive. To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Share of cancer deaths linked to dietary risk factors by cancer type
subtitle: Share of [cancer](#dod:cancer) deaths attributed to dietary risks, including low intake of fruits, vegetables, milk, fiber, nuts, seeds, whole grains, healthy fats, and legumes, and high intake of sugary drinks, processed meat, trans fats, red meat, and sodium.
